I am Emiri

a Front-end Developer

Click me

About

I'm Emiri, a self-taught front-end developer in Germany. I like to organize things and wondered if I could make my own To-Do app to make my life easier. Since then coding (especially JavaScript!) has triggered my curiosity and it was enough to motivate me to change my career to IT. My goal as front-end developer is to make modern web applications that make our lives a bit easier!
